head.title: Katherine L. Kavetas and Adam Rothschild Wed

hedline.hl1: Katherine L. Kavetas and Adam Rothschild Wed

block.p: LEAD: Katherine Louise Kavetas, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Harry L. Kavetas of New Canaan, Conn., was married there yesterday at the Congregational Church to Adam Rothschild, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Eric Rothschild of Scarsdale, N.Y. The Rev. Charles Crawford Smith officiated.

LEAD: Katherine Louise Kavetas, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Harry L. Kavetas of New Canaan, Conn., was married there yesterday at the Congregational Church to Adam Rothschild, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Eric Rothschild of Scarsdale, N.Y. The Rev. Charles Crawford Smith officiated.

Katherine Louise Kavetas, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Harry L. Kavetas of New Canaan, Conn., was married there yesterday at the Congregational Church to Adam Rothschild, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Eric Rothschild of Scarsdale, N.Y. The Rev. Charles Crawford Smith officiated.

Mrs. Rothschild, 24 years old, is an editorial assistant at Margaret K. McElderry Books, a publisher of children's books in New York. Mr. Rothschild, 26, is a marketing manager at American Express Travel Related Services in New York. Both are graduates of Harvard University.

The bride's father is president of the I.B.M. Credit Corporation in Stamford, Conn., and a vice president of the International Business Machines Corporation. The bridegroom's father is chairman of the social studies department at Scarsdale High School. His mother, Christine Rothschild, is a supervising public health nurse for Westchester County, N.Y.
